places.description: This place was open near the Airbnb that I stayed at. I really liked it, but it's nothing that great. It's open late, and the woman who operates it is really nice and will give you plenty of advice about the neighborhood.
This is the main square in Berlin. There are plenty of places to walk to from here.

This place was awesome. Tattoo shop and venue in the basement. Restaurant on top. If you're looking for American food and a weird vibe, this place is it. It's within walking distance of Alexanderplatz. Also, they have an octopus burger.

I got a cool little banger at this shop. I highly recommend it, but you need to make an appointment via the website. Some of the most famous tattooers from around the world tattoo out of this shop. It's well worth the expense if you're a tattoo collector. ☺
This is a nice coffeeshop to go to when in this neighborhood. Neukölln is a great neighborhood for day and night life in Berlin.

This place was really good to get coffee and breakfast in the morning. The locals who work the shop are from all over the world. They're very friendly and will give you recommendations on the night life if you ask. There's also a cool record shop next door.
They have local artist perform sometimes. If you're in Alexanderplatz then this place is pretty close. It's a locals bar.

This place is awesome. They have all sorts of Mexican memorabilia for sale. I bought a little China money cat wearing a lucador mask here. It's awesome. Check their website for their hours as this is just a showroom and it may not be open.
This is the Ritter Sport chocolate museum. It's a tourist trap, but has loads of chocolates to buy. It's also near some touristic parts of Berlin.
I ate food at this place and was happy with the quality of it. It's a typical Hamburg hangout for late-night food.
A simple little coffeeshop near all the nightclubs in Hamburg.

This nightclub is pretty dope. They have a coat check in the back, which I higly recommend. Hamburg is party central and dancing is currency. I had fun at this place until 7 am and was surprised by the sunshine when I left!
This place is accessible through the basement of Docks. Docks is a huge nightclub that opens at 10pm. Prinzenbar opens at 10am. 24 hour dance party.
This place is accessible through the basement of Prinzenbar. Prinzenbar is a small nightclub that opens at 10am. Docks opens at 10pm. Get it? Enjoy.
This is a local restaurant with outdoor seating. It's surrounded by other restaurants on the block as well in case you don't like anything on the menu.
